duck: Successor class submarine, a proposed replacement for the UK's Trident carrying Vanguard class submarines.
The Diadochi, or Successors to Alexander the Great
successor definition: one that follows; '''especially''' one who succeeds to a throne, title, estate, or office.

wiki.text:
A 'successor' can refer to

* Someone who, or something which succeeds or comes after (see success and
  succession)
* Successor (horse), an American Thoroughbred racehorse
* Successor class submarine, a proposed replacement for the UK's Trident
  carrying Vanguard class submarines.

In history:
* The Diadochi, or Successors to Alexander the Great

In mathematics:
* A successor cardinal
* A successor ordinal
* A successor function
* A successor (graph theory), a node following the current one in a path

In music:
* ''Successor'' (album), an album by Finnish power metal band Sonata Arctica

'The Successor' can refer to:

* ''The Successor'' (movie), a 1996 movie including Laura Girling
* ''The Successor'' (show), a 2006 Israeli television program
* ''The Successor'' (Kadare), a 2003 novel by Ismail Kadare
wiki.title: successor
